text: An officer or member of the Humane Society is not entitled to any fee as a witness in the prosecution of a case of cruelty to children or animals.

title.text: Judgments and Executions; Fees and Costs. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Witness fees in prosecutions for cruelty to children or animals.
